item.description:
****Market of the Living Dead: An event with live music, costume prize etc ****

Meeting point: Outside starbucks near to Tufts Medical Center stop on Orange Line.  Address of starbucks: 821 Washington Street, Boston, MA 02111. 2 mins walk from T station.


Mark your calendar for this Sunday, put on ghoulish makeup and your most outrageous attire, and head to the South End for the final October event in Boston's biggest outdoor market.  You might even win the $250 best costume price!  Perfect chance to stock up on holiday gifts from Boston and New England artisans and crafts people, and sample some of the best offerings from on-site food trucks.


When: Sunday, 28 October 2012

Where: 500 Harrison Ave, Boston

Transport: Orange Line/Back Bay, or Silverline bus
item.name: ****Market of the Living Dead: An event with live music, costume prize etc ****
